org.hps.online.recon

Class StationProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.online.recon.StationProcess

  • public class StationProcess
extends Object
    Manages the system process of a Station

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
        Convert station data to JSON.
        Returns:
        The converted JSON data

      • activate

        boolean activate(Server server)
          throws IOException,
                 InterruptedException
        Activate the reconstruction station, which includes starting its system process and connecting its remote AIDA tree
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a problem activating the station's process
        InterruptedException

      • deactivate

        void deactivate(Server server)
        Deactivate a station by unmounting its remote AIDA tree and killing its system process. The ET station will be removed when the Station process actually exits. This is called by StationManager.stopStation(StationProcess).

      • setActive

        void setActive(boolean active)
        Set the station to active
        Parameters:
        active - True to set station to active
